channel.title: Joint Workshop of NTT Labs (Japan) and NTT Research (USA)
channel.description: Recent content on Joint Workshop of NTT Labs (Japan) and NTT Research (USA)

item.title: Registration
item.description: Registration is free, but mandatory. The maximum number of participants is 80. To register this workshop, please send the information listed below to the following e-mail address: saho dot uchida dot pn at hco dot ntt dot co dot jp Name Affiliation

item.title: Speakers
item.description: Speakers (tentative) Brent Waters (NTT Research Inc.) Daniel Wichs (NTT Research Inc.) Aron Laszka (NTT Research Inc.) Shin’ichiro Matsuo (NTT Research Inc.) Masayuki Abe (NTT Secure Platform Laboratories) (Not confirmed yet, under negotiation) Mehdi Tibouchi (NTT Secure Platform Laboratories) (Not confirmed yet, under negotiation) Takashi Yamakawa (NTT Secure Platform Laboratories) (Not confirmed yet, under negotiation) Ryo Nishimaki (NTT Secure Platform Laboratories) (Not confirmed yet, under negotiation) and more

item.title: Venue
item.description: The venue is Hotel Granvia Kyoto This event will be held in Soushi-room (5F) Access to Hotel Granvia Kyoto Please see here

item.title: Schedule
item.description: The event schedule on December 13th (tentative) 8:30 Check-in 9:00 - 9:50 TBA by Brent Waters 9:50 - 10:40 TBA 11:00 - 11:50 TBA 11:50 Lunch (on your own) 13:30 - 14:20 TBA 14:20 - 14:50 TBA 15:10 - 15:40 TBA 15:40 - 16:10 TBA 16:30 - 17:10 TBA Abstract Extracting Randomness from Extractor-Dependent Sources Daniel Wichs (NTT Research Inc.
